title: 35ms to fk 150k
body: When i start a game, happens randomly, often when i play whit my freinds, i have a stable 35ms/ping but sometimes i get 0ver 15k or something like that, which makes it like impossible to play. I got a good wifi, works whit any other game, what is the problem! Help please

replies.body: It sounds like you might be suffering from a network issue like packet loss, which will cause lag spikes and ultimately a disconnect.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to analyze your connection and know for sure.  I also recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Hopefully, this will get you fixed up for good!
